definition: weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc

sentences.english: The pages referenced in the table below refer to texts from Modern Poems.
sentences.chinese: 下表中引用的頁碼指《現代詩》中的文段。

sentences.english: There is a misprint in line 3 from the top of the page.
sentences.chinese: 從頁碼頂上往下數第3行中有個印錯的字。

sentences.english: It presents the full text on one page, without the pagination links.
sentences.chinese: 它將全文呈現在同一頁面，而不顯示頁碼鏈接。

sentences.english: Should you have a text field so users can jump to a page number?
sentences.chinese: 是否需要配備文本字段以便用戶可以跳轉到某個頁碼？

sentences.english: Format your report so that the page number appears at the top of each page.
sentences.chinese: 將你的報告格式化，這樣頁碼就會出現在每頁的頂部。

sentences.english: There is not enough memory to repaginate or print this document.
sentences.chinese: 內存不足，無法重編頁碼或打印文檔。

sentences.english: P-number Prints the page number minus the specified number.
sentences.chinese: 打印減去指定數目的頁碼。

sentences.english: Pagination the numbering of the make-up pages in consecutive order of a book.
sentences.chinese: 在拼版後的書頁加上順序頁碼的情況。

sentences.english: He numbered the pages in the bottom corner.
Number the pages of your exercise book.
sentences.chinese: 把你的練習本編上頁碼。

sentences.english: To display the page where the entry is located, click the page number.
sentences.chinese: 要顯示條目所位於的頁面，請單擊頁碼。

sentences.english: I can paginate , preview and print my work.
sentences.chinese: 打印材料時，我會先標上頁碼和預覽後纔打印。

sentences.english: Area occupied by text and illustration on a page, including running head and folio.
sentences.chinese: 正文及插圖，包括書眉和頁碼，在書頁內所佔的面積。

sentences.english: There are no fixed pages or page numbers anymore.
sentences.chinese: 如此一來，固定的書頁和頁碼就不復存在了。

definition: variant of 匯編|汇编[hui4 bian1]
forged book/book of dubious authenticity/misattributed book/Apocrypha
to mark a text with dots and circles/to punctuate
Ji Yun (1724-1805), Qing Dynasty writer, author of supernatural novel Notes on a Minutely Observed Thatched Hut 閱微草堂筆記|阅微草堂笔记
variant character/loan word/variant written form (for the same word)/different edition
to publish (in newspapers or magazines)/to record (bookkeeping entries)
to write a word incorrectly/typo/(medicine) to mistakenly transplant (an infected organ etc)
